review: Love this item.  We use it every single day.  It may not be a necessary component to those with smart TV's, but if you don't have a smart TV and want to access all the same apps and content that you can get on your phone or tablet, this is the device for you.  I love how it integrates with my Apple products so I can mirror my iPad and iPhone displays and pull picture and video streams automatically.
